title: What is the meaning of the Sanskrit term "virya" and how can it be applied to magical virility?
first_phrase: This text explores the concept of virility, specifically within the context of magical ascension. It touches on Sanskrit terminology and the Khecari-mudrii practice, which allows a person to maintain their virility even while being intimate with a passionate partner. The text also references Abraxa and the purification of matter, the symbolism of Fineo's lance, and the idea of suspending the descent of semen to achieve a transfiguration. These concepts are part of an operation of magic that can only be understood by delving deeper into the secret regime of igniting the Fire.

Allora hanno inizio i prodigi di Fineo » Se questo simbolismo saprai intenderlo, vi ricono scerai tutti gli elementi dell'Operazione. last_phrase: In summary, to achieve the transmutation of energies in the mystical act of love, you must understand the symbolism of Fineo's lance, wait for the crisis, suspend the process of descent of semen, and unite in total amalgamation of the complementary forces.
